package.name: bzip2
package.patch: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} cat ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-1.0.5-install_docs-1.patch | patch -p1 ## cat ${SRCDIR}/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}-version_fixes-1.patch | patch -p1 sed -i 's@\(ln -s -f \)$(PREFIX)/bin/@\1@' Makefile
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} make -f Makefile-libbz2_so make clean make
package.install: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/bin mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/lib mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib make PREFIX=${TGTDIR}/usr install install -m 0755 bzip2-shared ${TGTDIR}/bin/bzip2 cp -av libbz2.so* ${TGTDIR}/lib ln -sv ../../lib/libbz2.so.1.0 ${TGTDIR}/usr/lib/libbz2.so rm -v ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/{bunzip2,bzcat,bzip2} ln -sv bzip2 ${TGTDIR}/bin/bunzip2 ln -sv bzip2 ${TGTDIR}/bin/bzcat
